Title: Silverlight Solitaire
Description: An implementation of Klondike Solitaire in Silverlight 3.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
An implementation of Klondike Solitaire in Silverlight 3.

Would you like to contribute to this project? Solitaire could use a better interface and possibly implementations of different types of solitaire games (spider, etc). I wrote this a while back when I was first learning Silverlight, so I would like to refactor it to more of an MVVM model.
